bill_title: regulate the sale of certain cannabis-infused beverages.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to regulate the sale of certain cannabis-infused beverages. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That a NEW SECTION be added to chapter 35-4: Unless otherwise allowed under chapter 34-20G, no cannabis-infused beverage may be sold to a retailer licensed under this chapter or licensed under chapter 10-45 unless: (1) The seller is a wholesaler licensed under this chapter; and (2) The tetrahydrocannabinol concentration of the beverage is no greater than three-tenths of one percent. Section 2. That a NEW SECTION be added to chapter 35-4: Unless otherwise allowed under chapter 34-20G, no cannabis-infused beverage may be sold in a retail sale to a consumer unless the retailer is licensed pursuant to this chapter and: (1) The retail sale occurs on the premises of an off-sale or on-sale establishment; (2) The consumer is at least twenty-one years of age; and (3) The tetrahydrocannabinol concentration of the beverage is no greater than three-tenths of one percent. A violation of this section is a Class 2 misdemeanor.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
